thread.title: Diane G from H-Town
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Diane G from H-Town

author: Diane G from H-Town
title: Diane G from H-Town
text: I'm a new customer with Elevate Styles. In a short time, I found their customer service to be the best I've experienced. The orders are quickly shipped and delivered within 2-3 days. I often shop on-line and have to wait at least 7-10 days (sometimes 2-3 weeks) to receive a shipment. Their excellent response and customer service extends through resolving problems as I found out with my last order. The product delivered did not match the hair color shown on their website. Within an hour of being notified of the problem, I received the return shipping label. They kept me informed on the status of my return and fully refunded the purchase price. I will recommend Elevate Styles to family & friends.
